snippet: Russia’s consumer price inflation hit 16.9 percent in March as the country headed for recession, the state statistics agency Rosstat said.
abstract: Russian state statistics agency Rosstat reports that consumer price inflation hit 16.9 percent in March as country headed toward recession.
lead_paragraph: Russia’s consumer price inflation hit 16.9 percent in March as the country headed for recession, the state statistics agency Rosstat said.

headline.print_headline: Consumer Price Inflation Reaches 16.9%. in Russia
headline.main: Consumer Price Inflation Reaches 16.9% in Russia
